committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources
Subcommittee on Mining, Forest Management and Bonneville Power Administration

official_title: A bill to clarify the treatment of mineral materials on public lands.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends Federal mining law to permit the removal of not only surface vegetative resources but also surface mineral resources from a claim area. Entitles a mining claimant to free mineral material substantially equivalent to the disposed mineral material if such claimant needs more mineral material for mining operations than is available after the United States has disposed of mineral material from the claim.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the treatment of mineral materials on public lands.
